parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: ProjectId
parameters.description: The DataWorks workspace ID. You can call the [ListProjects](~~2852607~~) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: Spec
parameters.description: The FlowSpec information for this UDF function. For more information, see [FlowSpec](https://github.com/aliyun/dataworks-spec/blob/master/README_zh_CN.md).
